reuo.resources.view

Class Checker

  • java.lang.Object
    • reuo.resources.view.Checker

  • public final class Checker
extends java.lang.Object
    A simple two color checker pattern. If the two colors are the same this drawing operation will perform the same as a solid color. The checker colors are blended between setForeground(Color) and setBackground(Color) with the setAlpha(float) value. The size of the checker may be changed with setSize(int).

      Initializes a checker pattern with the specified colors and size.

      Initializes a checker pattern with the colors from the provided JComponent with the specified size.

        Parameters:

        Throws:

      • paint

        public void paint(java.awt.Graphics2D g,

        Parameters:
        g - the graphics to use for drawing
        bounds - the clipping bounds
